document_data.mainbody:
olkin Alassandar was the leader of the Seven Snakes mercenary group in the late 15 century DR.
Xolkin and his six fellow mercenaries usually did "dirty work" for the Zhentarim, in particular Nelkin Danniker.
In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, Xolkin plotted with the fellow Zhent Kella Darkhope to occupy the village of Nightstone. However, a cloud giant bombardment ruined Kellas plan. Xolkin and his men arrived to find the settlement ruined and infested by goblins.
Xolkin was in love with Kella Darkhope.
